categories: Category:Star Wars: The Han Solo Adventures

nodes.text: The Han Solo Adventures is a Star Wars Legends novel by Brian Daley. It collects all three volumes of the Star Wars: The Han Solo Adventures series: Han Solo at Stars' End (1979), Han Solo's Revenge (1979), and Han Solo and the Lost Legacy (1980). The compendium was first published on April 22, 1992 by Del Rey.
